data.comment: The big names in today's match at Children's Mercy Park have now been confirmed.
In the minute 0, Kick-off has been delayed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
In the minute 2, Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 6, At Children's Mercy Park, Kansas City are penalized for being offside.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
Free kick Kansas City.
In the minute 9, Rodrigo Schlegel is booked for the away team.
Kansas City are coming forward and Graham Zusi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 10, Orlando have a goal kick.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
In the minute 14, Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Throw-in for Orlando at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 17, Kansas City have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Kansas City.
Victor Rivas signals a Orlando throw-in in Kansas City's half.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Can Kansas City capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Orlando just outside Kansas City's area.
Matt Besler (Kansas City) has received a first yellow card.
Rodrigo Schlegel (Orlando) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Orlando advance rapidly upfield but Victor Rivas blows for offside.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Orlando.
Important block from the Kansas City defence as Kyle Smith fires in a strike for Orlando.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Kansas City.
In the minute 33, In Kansas City, Kansas City push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Victor Rivas awards the away team a throw-in.
Victor Rivas awards Kansas City a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Orlando needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
Tesho Akindele scores to make it 0-1 at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 36, Ruan with an assist there.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Orlando.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Orlando extend their lead to 0-2 through Benji Michel.
Nani instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 40, Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Kansas City push forward at Children's Mercy Park and Ilie Sanchez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Orlando defence.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Orlando at Children's Mercy Park.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
In the minute 43, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Kansas City.
Ruan is back on the pitch.
Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
In the minute 45, Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Children's Mercy Park.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Kansas City to check on Ruan, who is grimacing with pain.
The second-half is underway in Kansas City.
In the minute 46, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Winston Reid is on a sub for Matt Besler for Kansas City.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 48, The match at Children's Mercy Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pedro Gallese, who is down injured.
Orlando's Pedro Gallese looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kansas City's Khiry Shelton has been booked in Kansas City.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Free kick Kansas City.
In the minute 54, Victor Rivas signals a throw-in for Orlando, close to Kansas City's area.
Goal! A headed strike from the home team reduces their deficit to 1-2. Johnny Russell got above everyone else to nod it in.
Great play from Gerso Fernandes to set up the goal.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Victor Rivas signals a Kansas City throw-in in Orlando's half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Orlando.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 59, Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Kansas City's Johnny Russell breaks free at Children's Mercy Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
In the minute 62, Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Mauricio Pereyra is replacing Jhegson Mendez for the away team.
In the minute 64, Victor Rivas signals a Kansas City throw-in in Orlando's half.
Kansas City make their second substitution with Alan Pulido replacing Felipe Hernandez.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 66, Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Gadi Kinda for Kansas City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 67, Victor Rivas awards Orlando a goal kick.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, In Kansas City Kansas City attack through Gadi Kinda. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
Daryl Dike is replacing Tesho Akindele for Orlando at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 71, Oscar Pareja (Orlando) is making a third substitution, with Chris Mueller replacing Benji Michel.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kansas City's Johnny Russell gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 73, Victor Rivas awards Orlando a goal kick.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Kansas City.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Orlando.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Orlando are pushing forward but Nani's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
In the minute 77, Kansas City push upfield but Victor Rivas quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Mauricio Pereyra (Orlando) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 78, In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Andres Perea (Orlando) gets a yellow card.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 79, Oscar Pareja is making the team's fourth substitution at Children's Mercy Park with Alex De John replacing Nani.
Mauricio Pereyra gets his shot on target but fails to score for Orlando.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
In the minute 81, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Orlando advance rapidly upfield but Victor Rivas blows for offside.
In the minute 85, Gadi Kinda (Kansas City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Graham Zusi for Kansas City drives towards goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Gerso Fernandes of Kansas City gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 88, Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 88, The home team replace Gerso Fernandes with Erik Hurtado.
Throw-in Orlando.
Victor Rivas signals a Kansas City throw-in in Orlando's half.
Victor Rivas will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Roberto Puncec (Kansas City) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Orlando at Children's Mercy Park.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Victor Rivas awards the home team a throw-in.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
